search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Heymarket SMS (heymarket.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Heymarket SMS is: [https://www.heymarket.com/pricing/](https://www.heymarket.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Heymarket Pricing - Business Text Messaging Cost - Heymarket

extracted_content.content:
### Standard

$  Per user / month billed annually  
Minimum 2 users

###### What's included

*   Minimum 2 users\*
    
    \*add more users for $  each per month
    
*   2 way messaging
*   Shared inbox
*   Conversation management
*   Unlimited contacts
*   Templates and tags
*   Basic reporting
*   Hubspot integration

Most Popular

### Plus

$  Per user / month billed annually  
Minimum 2 users

###### What's included

*   Minimum 2 users\*
    
    \*add more users for $  each per month
    
*   All Standard Plan features
*   Lists and campaigns
*   Automations
*   Advanced reporting and analytics
*   ✦ AI Essentials
*   HubSpot and other integrations\*
    
    \* excludes Salesforce
    

### Pro

$  Per user / month billed annually  
Minimum 2 users

###### What's included

*   Minimum 2 users\*
    
    \*add more users for $  each per month
    
*   All Plus Plan features
*   ✦ AI Advanced
*   Access to API
*   Advanced administration and security
*   Salesforce Add-on Available
    
    $7.50 per user, per month
    
    ![Image 1: Salesforce logo](https://www.heymarket.com/wp-content/themes/heymarket/dist/images/salesforce-2x.png)

### Enterprise

![Image 2: Black and yellow chat bubbles](https://www.heymarket.com/wp-content/themes/heymarket/dist/images/enterprise-plan-chat-bubbles.png)

###### What's included

*   Custom users
*   All Pro Plan features
*   Custom feature configuration
*   White-glove onboarding
*   Additional training resources
*   Priority support services
*   High volume messaging available

Calculate messaging costs

Number of SMS/MMS per month

$0.03 per message segment

1,000

Full Feature Breakdown
----------------------

Compare each plan’s features and benefits. Still unsure which plan is best for you? [Get in touch with our team](https://www.heymarket.com/contact-sales/).

Pricing FAQ
-----------

Heymarket offers four plans: Standard, Plus, Pro, and Enterprise. Each plan is based on the features included. We bill our plans per user, and each plan has a minimum of two users.

Our pricing is based on the following steps:

1.  **Choose your plan.** Heymarket offers four plans: Standard, Plus, Pro, and Enterprise. Each plan is based on the number of types of features included.
2.  **Select your users.** All plans have a minimum of two users. Select the number of users in your team, and your plan will be billed per user.
3.  **Choose your message bundle.** Select how many messages you need to send. If you exceed the number of messages you purchased, you will be moved to the next tier (more on this below).
4.  **Select monthly or annual billing**. Annual plans receive a discount equivalent to two months of Heymarket free, spread out over the course of the year.
5.  **Add any add-ons**. You can purchase additional features for certain plans.

In addition to the features listed in each plan, each user gets an inbox and a phone number if needed. If your team has five users, your Heymarket subscription will include up to five

[shared inboxes](https://www.heymarket.com/product/shared-inbox/), each with a

[phone number](https://www.heymarket.com/product/phone-numbers/). They can be set up at any time.

There is a $10 per month per campaign charge that covers all 10DLC registration and compliance for your Heymarket account.

Your messages are pooled across all inboxes. If you exceed the number of messages you purchased, you will not be charged overages. Instead, you will be moved to the next tier of messages based on your usage. If you ever need to change your messages allotments, you can modify your plan to do so at the end of your billing period.

1 SMS segment = a 160 bytes message = a 160 basic text character message.  
If you go over 160 basic text characters you are charged for additional SMS segments.  
For example: 1-160 character(s) = 1 SMS segment and 161-306 characters = 2 SMS segments.  
MMS counts as 1 segment.

WhatsApp messages count as message segments toward your monthly or annual message segment allotment.

A Heymarket team is a group of users and objects (e.g., contacts, templates, lists, etc), where the objects in the team are shared by default. A team can have one or more shared inboxes, each of which can be configured to support various messaging channels. Administrators control who in the team has access to which shared inboxes. Inboxes are typically set up to message for each department (e.g., Sales, Operations) and/or location (e.g., New York, San Francisco)

Heymarket supports majors credit cards. For Enterprise, Plus and Pro subscriptions, invoice billing is also available.

Annual subscriptions include a discount equivalent to two months of Heymarket for free, spread out over the course of the year. We also offer discounts for nonprofit organizations and for customers that sign up for a high volume of users or messages.

To learn about subscription cancellations, visit section 9.6 of our

[terms of service](https://www.heymarket.com/tos/#:~:text=For%20annual%20subscriptions%2C%20you,for%20such%20subscription%20period.).

Heymarket is SOC 2 Type 2 compliant and HIPAA compliant. You can learn more about our industry compliance measures on our

[compliance page](https://www.heymarket.com/sms-compliance/), and learn more about our platform’s security features on our

[security page](https://www.heymarket.com/security/).

Boost your business with text messaging services. Reach customers instantly, increase engagement with unlimited contacts and drive sales with Heymarket’s SMS solution.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user per month, billed annually. Enterprise tier requires custom pricing.

additional_fees.fee_description: Per user, per month for Salesforce integration.
